code: import React,{useState}from"react";import AdminLogin from"./AdminLogin";import AdminBookings from"./AdminBookings";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AdminApp(){const[token,setToken]=useState(localStorage.getItem("admin_token")||"");const handleLogin=tk=>{setToken(tk);localStorage.setItem("admin_token",tk);};const handleLogout=()=>{setToken("");localStorage.removeItem("admin_token");};if(!token)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminLogin,{onLogin:handleLogin});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminBookings,{token:token,onLogout:handleLogout});}export default AdminApp;
